## DocumentResource.getZipped() method

Retrieves all documents of a package in a zipped file.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getZipped(packageId: string, flatten?: boolean): Promise<Responses.Response>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  packageId | string | Package ID |
|  flatten | boolean | (Optional) Flattens the PDFs |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Responses.Response&gt;

Zipped documents of a package

- [REST API documentation (OneSpan)](https://community.onespan.com/products/onespan-sign/sandbox#/Documents/api.packages._packageId.documents.zip.get)
